name: Run and Fire
description:
Run And Fire is a 2D platformer with shooter elements in which you have to fight enemies.
This is a linear and very interesting platformer in which you will have to go on various journeys, fight with various types of enemies.
With each new level you will meet more and more powerful enemies. Think over your every step, avoid the trap and do everything that will help you successfully complete your task!

KEY FEATURES:

- Hardcore gameplay
- Variety of game content
- Relaxing soundtrack
- Unforgettable impressions
